products.label: Demo: Custom IaC for Agentic AI
products.short_description: Provisions the Loan Risk AI Agents sample application on IBM Cloud Code Engine using a serverless architecture
products.long_description:
Configures a serverless IBM Cloud Code Engine project to deploy the Loan Risk AI Agents sample application designed as a proof of concept (PoC) for adopting agentic AI in enterprise workflows.

The application showcases a bank loan processing workflow in the financial industry, demonstrating how LLMs can drive reasoning and actionsâ€”moving beyond traditional rule-based approaches. It uses IBM Cloud services including watsonx.ai for inferencing and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and watsonx Assistant/Orchestrate for conversational interactions.

features.description: Creates a Code Engine build that compiles your application source code, builds a container image, and pushes it to the specified container registry using the stored authentication secret.
